thread.title: View of the Eiffel Tower
thread.title_full: View of the Eiffel Tower - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: cmhansberger2017
title: View of the Eiffel Tower
text:
I loved this hotel. Just down the avenue from the Eiffel Tower. A perfect spot to film the lights that "twinkle' on the hour. Close to everything. Bus tour is close by. Rooms were spotless. Breakfast was great. Def would recommend.
Room Tip: best views See more room tips
